comments:
*** ERROR ***: Tue Aug 28 12:00:39 EDT 2007    org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.DeploymentDescriptorLoadException: WEB-INF/web.xml

PIF and workspace .log are available upon request

The same PIF builds error free on Eclipse 3.0.2

Steps to reproduce:
1, Launch Eclipse with a new workspace
2, Import the PIF and wait until auto-build completes
3, Find the following exception in workspace .log file:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2007-08-28 12:00:39.515
!MESSAGE 
*** ERROR ***: Tue Aug 28 12:00:39 EDT 2007    org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.DeploymentDescriptorLoadException: WEB-INF/web.xml
    Stack trace of nested exception:
    org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.EmptyResourceException: platform:/resource/ARBankLogWeb/WebContent/WEB-INF/web.xml
    	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.util.ArchiveUtil.getRoot(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.XmlBasedImportStrategyImpl.primLoadDeploymentDescriptor(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.War22ImportStrategyImpl.loadDeploymentDescriptor(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.War22ImportStrategyImpl.importMetaData(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.impl.WARFileImpl.getDeploymentDescriptor(Unknown Source)
    	at com.ibm.ws.ast.ext.web.internal.validation.WarValidator.validate(Unknown Source)
    	at com.ibm.ws.ast.ext.web.internal.validation.WarValidator.validateInJob(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(Unknown Source)
    	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2007-08-28 12:00:39.546
!MESSAGE 
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.DeploymentDescriptorLoadException: WEB-INF/web.xml
Stack trace of nested exception:
org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.exception.EmptyResourceException: platform:/resource/ARBankLogWeb/WebContent/WEB-INF/web.xml
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.util.ArchiveUtil.getRoot(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.XmlBasedImportStrategyImpl.primLoadDeploymentDescriptor(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.War22ImportStrategyImpl.loadDeploymentDescriptor(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.War22ImportStrategyImpl.importMetaData(Unknown Source)

Expected result:
The same PIF builds error free on Eclipse 3.0.2 so it shouldn't produce these errors on Eclipse 3.2.2
